email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive for this route. The laycan window is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Could you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details and any additional terms. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Final Details
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.00 works for you. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details and the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you need any further clarifications. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Final Details
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the agreement as discussed. Please confirm the laycan dates and ensure the vessel is ready for loading on October 20. Thanks for your assistance. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The MV Ocean Star will be ready for loading in Houston on October 20. I’ll send over the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah
